todos.title: CLOSER
todos.body: Have they show the ability to close deals?

todos.title: SKILL
todos.body: Have they proven to make money, not just spend their own?

todos.title: FAILURE
todos.body: Have they experienced failures and more importantly have they built systems to avoid making same mistake?

todos.title: INTUITION
todos.body: Do you get a good feeling when you work with them?

todos.title: STRATEGY
todos.body: Do they value creating a strong strategy?

todos.title: PATIENCE
todos.body: Do they take the time to do the job right the first time?

todos.title: SELF STARTER
todos.body: Do they take initiative or wait to be told what to do?

todos.title: GOSSIP
todos.body: Do they speak positively about others, even if they have been wronged by them?

todos.title: PERFECTIONIST
todos.body: Do they limit their strive for perfection (done is better than perfect)?

todos.title: OBJECTIVES
todos.body: Do they have the resources to meet your objectives?

todos.title: EXECUTIVE COACH
todos.body: Do they have strong mentors/executive coaches?

todos.title: BUSINESS INTEGRITY
todos.body: Do they have business integrity (fair players, not-cutthroat)?

todos.title: CONNECTIONS
todos.body: Do they have a lot of positive relationships?

todos.title: GUIDE
todos.body: Do they guide and not just give (helping can be hurting)?

todos.title: COMMUNICATION
todos.body: Do they communicate well?

todos.title: OVERCOMMIT
todos.body: Do they avoid over-commitment?

todos.title: PROACVTIVE
todos.body: Do they anticipate a need before it becomes a problem?

todos.title: ADAPTION
todos.body: Do they adapt efficiently to new information?

todos.title: EMOTIONS
todos.body: Do they act rationally when it comes to decisions and emotionally when it is dealing with people?

todos.title: PRONOUNS
todos.body: Do team members refer to the team as we instead of they or I?

todos.title: REFERENCES
todos.body: Do other people say good things about them?

todos.title: PASSION
todos.body: Can you see in their eyes the urge to master something new?

todos.title: SKIN IN THE GAME
todos.body: Are they willing to put their own hard earned capital or sweat equity into the game?

todos.title: NO MAN
todos.body: Are they willing to play devil's advocate when needed and not just be a yes man.

todos.title: ENGAGE
todos.body: Are they willing to get their hands dirty?

todos.title: TOUGH LOVE
todos.body: Are they willing to confront people and provide tough love?

todos.title: HELP
todos.body: Are they willing to ask for help when needed?

todos.title: SPIRITUAL
todos.body: Are they spiritual?

todos.title: ORGANIZATION
todos.body: Are they organized?

todos.title: CHALLENGES
todos.body: Are they optimistic about challenges?

todos.title: TARDY
todos.body: Are they on-time?

todos.title: HARD-WORKING
todos.body: Are they hard working, willing to put in extra non-traditional hours when needed?

todos.title: FOSTERING RELATIONSHIPS
todos.body: Are they good with people and good at fostering relationships?

todos.title: NUMBERS
todos.body: Are they good with numbers?

todos.title: FOCUS
todos.body: Are they focused and not easily distracted?

todos.title: CONFIDENCE
todos.body: Are they confident in their skills and decisions?

todos.title: EFFECTIVE MULTI-TASK
todos.body: Are they able to prioritize tasks?

todos.title: DECISIONS
todos.body: Do they have the ability to make quick and quality decisions?

todos.title: SELF-FORGIVING
todos.body: Do they easily forgive themselves instead of putting too much pressure on themselves?
